privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: Learn how IdolDo collects, uses, and protects your personal information.
privacy.intro: At IdolDo, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our mobile application and website.

collect.title: Information We Collect
collect.content:
We may collect information that you provide directly to us, including:
• Email address when you join our waitlist
• Account information if you create an account
• Game data and preferences
• Device information and usage statistics

use.title: How We Use Your Information
use.content:
We use the information we collect to:
• Provide, maintain, and improve our services
• Send you updates about our product launch
• Respond to your comments and questions
• Analyze usage patterns to enhance user experience

share.title: Information Sharing
share.content: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share information with service providers who assist in our operations, subject to confidentiality agreements.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at privacy@idoldo.com.

tos.title: Terms of Service
tos.description: Read the terms and conditions for using IdolDo services.
tos.intro: Welcome to IdolDo. By accessing or using our application and services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By using IdolDo, you confirm that you are at least 13 years old and agree to comply with these terms. If you do not agree, please do not use our services.

use.title: Use of Service
use.content:
You agree to use IdolDo only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms. You may not:
• Use the service in any way that violates applicable laws
• Upload content that infringes intellectual property rights
• Attempt to interfere with the proper working of the service
• Use automated means to access the service without permission

content.title: User Content
content.content: You retain ownership of content you create using IdolDo. By uploading content, you grant us a license to use, display, and distribute your content within the platform. You are responsible for ensuring you have the right to use any images or materials you upload.

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: The IdolDo name, logo, and all related names, logos, product and service names are trademarks of IdolDo. You may not use these marks without our prior written permission.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: IdolDo is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. We do not guarantee that the service will be uninterrupted, secure, or error-free.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: For questions about these Terms, please contact us at legal@idoldo.com.

about.title: About Us
about.description: Learn more about IdolDo and our mission to empower fan creativity.

hero.title: Empowering Fan Creativity
hero.subtitle: IdolDo is the ultimate platform for creating, sharing, and playing fan games. We believe every fan has a story to tell.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: We're building tools that make it incredibly easy for fans to express their creativity. No coding required, no complex software to learn—just your passion and your favorite photos.

story.title: Our Story
story.content: IdolDo was born from a simple idea: what if anyone could create a fun, shareable game featuring their favorite idols? Our team of passionate developers and designers came together to make this vision a reality.

creativity.title: Creativity First
creativity.description: We believe everyone is creative. Our tools remove barriers so your ideas can shine.

community.title: Community Driven
community.description: Fans are at the heart of everything we do. We build for the community, with the community.

simplicity.title: Radical Simplicity
simplicity.description: Complex technology, simple experience. Creating should feel like magic, not work.
